text: Yuki Tsunoda (Japanese: 角田 裕毅, Tsunoda Yūki, ; born 11 May 2000) is a Japanese racing driver currently competing in Formula One for the RB Formula One Team. Supported by Honda since 2016 through the , he was the 2018 Japanese F4 champion and in 2019 also received backing from Red Bull. He finished third in the 2020 Formula 2 Championship and made his Formula One debut in 2021 for AlphaTauri. == References == Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from Kanagawa Prefecture
title: Yuki Tsunoda
